description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in SourceCodester Student Study Center Desk Management System 1.0. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file admin/?page=reports&date_from=2023-02-17&date_to=2023-03-17 of the component Report Handler. The manipulation of the argument date_from/date_to leads to sql injection. The attack can be launched remotely. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-223327.

product.name: Student Study Center Desk Management System
